ruleContent.content:
var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?$.chapterid+"、":'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
result=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
v=vip?'◇ ':'';l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=v+num+title+l;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
如要登录，请看搜索地址，请先删了Token的值再获取验证码

填写token=登录

需填写token的地方
1.搜索页的搜索地址
2.发现页的每日福利跟书币余额<不领的话可不填>
3.目录页的章节url

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"time="+time,
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}
function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

if(!baseUrl.match(/welfare\/award/)){
if(baseUrl.match(/bookid/)){
java.put('token',baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1]);
java.put('book',baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]);
list=[{"name":"书币余额","book_id":baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]}];
result=JSON.stringify(list)
}else{

page=java.get('page');
cat=baseUrl.match(/cat=(\d+)/)[1];
finished=baseUrl.match(/finished=(\d+)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("finished="+finished);
li.push("cat="+cat);
li.push("page_num="+page);
sign=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+sign);
j=toJson(li);

option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/category-index,'+JSON.stringify(option);
java.ajax(url)}}else{
l=[];
var token=baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("read_time=44800");
li.push("token="+token);
s=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",

searchUrl:
<js>
/*调试->右上角的小虫子，随便搜一个词*/
/*Token写了东西的话要删掉才能进行下面步骤：
①填上电话号码点调试会获取验证码；
②填上验证码点调试会获取token；
③把token填在Token【目录的章节url那也有个token记得也要填，不填的话从发现点的书是没有登录的】；
④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源*/
/*如登录过期需要重新登录，请删除以前填写的token再调试获取验证码，重复前面的步骤*/

电话号码="";

验证码="";

Token="34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20";

//下面不要动
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=java.put('token',Token);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始
num=电话号码;
y=验证码;
if(num.match(/^\d{11}$/) && !y  && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束

li=lll;
li.push("page_num="+page);
li.push("keyword="+key);
s1=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s1);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/search,'+JSON.stringify(option)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.正文乱码或空需登录刷新正文，登录建议随便点进一本书的正文后再点勾
2.建议关闭预下载
3.网站限制频繁访问
4.（因为阅读会预下载大概率会频繁访问）频繁访问后如果出现乱码或空，请隔十多分钟再刷新

href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");

</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url=baseUrl+'/limit18';
value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(java.getCookie(baseUrl,null));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);
result=String(java.ajax(Url))
}else{result=result}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}

};

}

只看楼主
◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）
◎内容只有楼主发帖，无作者名时间等
去空行
◎层与层之间有一行空行，不想要空行的话
◎就在书籍详情页的简介内容填上【去空行】
◎只看楼主跟去空行随便怎么写，写对字就行
